page.title: 09Employment (l)
page.content: The majority of the Bickmarsh, Cleeve Prior, Littleton and Ullington area is under cultivation and as a result of modern farming and horticultural techniques it is no longer labour intensive. The exceptions being various small enterprises individually employing small numbers of people. In the main the working population of this area tends to commute to local centres of industry and commerce in towns such as Cheltenham, Evesham, Redditch, Stratford and Worcester. Some commuters travel as far as Birmingham and London.
